name: CommonIonsStudy
0:
”Alexa, open Common Ions Study”
”What is the chemical structure of Lithium?”
”Start a quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: common ions study
des:
Using Common Ions Study, you can learn more and study your Chemistry skills using different commands, including:

1. Quiz:
In starting a quiz, you can choose how many questions to be asked. You are then asked either for the chemical structure of a specific ion name or for the name of a specific chemical structure. Each round, the item and property is randomized, allowing for the best study experience possible. If you get one wrong, you can try again. When you end the quiz, it will tell you your score!

2. Chemical Structures:
Ask what the chemical structure is for an ion, and it will tell you!

3. Ion Names:
Ask what the name of a chemical structure is, and it will tell you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
